column1: #Text=Iroh says : " There is a storm coming .
#Text=" Iroh says : " A storm is approaching from the north .
#Text=I suggest we alter our course and head southwest .
#Text=" Zuko says : " We know the Avatar is traveling northward , so we will do the same .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Prince Zuko , consider the safety of the crew .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The safety of the crew does n't matter !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Finding the Avatar is far more important than any individual 's safety .
#Text=" Iroh says : " He does n't mean that .
